|cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = MIPS 4Kc |cpu1_type_rev = |cpu1spd = 180 |is_doc = |bus = |flash1type = |fla1_num = |fla1chip = Atmel;AT49BV322A-70TI; |flash1size = 4 |flash1maxsize = |ram1type = |ram1type1 = |ram1spd = |ram1size = 16 |ram1chip = SK hynix;HY57V281620HCT-H; |ram1_num = |nvramsize = |eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = IC+;IP101A; |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 100MbE |ethstandard = |auto_mdix = |sup_jumbo = |ethoui = 00:11:95 |oui = 00:11:95 |bootwait = |stockbootloader = |stockos = VxWorks;;; |exp_if_types = |pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 5 |pwr_amp_dc = 2 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = |pwr_barrel_inner = |pwr_barrel_len = |pwr_pol = |serial = yes,, populated,, 4-pin header,, internal |jtag = yes |specialfeat = |flags = |addchip = |802dot11_protocols = bg |defaulip = 192.168.0.35 |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = |defaultssid = |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = |manuf = Alpha Networks |manuf_model = WAP-G08 |manuf_rev = |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = |availability = |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = 06/17/2004 |estreldate = |estprice = |upc = |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |countrymanuf = China |buttons = |led = |dimensions = |weight = |wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1cpu = true |rad1chip2 = Atheros;AR2112A;AR2112A-00, CP0083.0E, 5004, HONG KONG; |rad1oui = |rad1_ant_conn = RP-SMA |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g |rad1g = 108 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "8WAPG08..2A1" is silkscreened on the board. ===Probable PSU(s)=== The power supply included with the US distributed units looks to be a '''JENTEC''' JTA0302A. {{hasPowerSupply |brand = JENTEC |model = JTA0302A |input_v=100-120 |input_a=0.5 |input_c=AC |input_hz=50-60 |input_conn=NEMA 1-15P |output_v=5 |output_a=2 |output_c=DC |output_conn=barrel |style=small, straight |countrymanuf = China }} ==Links of Interest== *[http://wiki.openwrt.org/oldwiki/hardware/dlink On the '''''OpenWrt''''' Wiki's (old) '''D-Link''' hardware table] *[https://forum.openwrt.org/viewtopic.php?pid=52134 On the '''OpenWrt''' Forums] ==JTAG-Serial Info== ===Serial=== ====Serial Pinouts==== It seems to be a standard '''Alpha''' pinout.. 
JP2
(RxD)       (3.3) (GND) (TxD)
===Info derived from=== {{/Serial info}} [[Category:English Documentation]]
